text: The Major League Cricket regular season has ended, and the playoffs are set to begin. The Texas Super Kings have qualified for the playoffs and will face MI New York in the "Eliminator match" on July 24 at 7:30 p.m. CT at Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas. The winners of the Eliminator match will advance to the "Challenger match" against the loser of the "Qualifier match" between San Francisco and Washington Freedom, which will take place on July 26. The winner of the Qualifier match will directly advance to the Championship match. MI New York is the defending champion and has been the No. 4 seed in the playoffs every season. All playoff matches will be played at Grand Prairie Stadium, and tickets are available online.

**Match Result:** Texas Super Kings (TSK) won against MI New York by 9 wickets in an eliminator match.

**TSK's Performance:** Openers Faf du Plessis (72 off 47 balls) and Devon Conway (50* off 42 balls) laid a solid foundation with a 101-run opening stand. Aaron Hardie contributed with a quick 34* off 20 balls to ensure a comfortable chase.

**MI New York's Performance:** Shayan Jahangir and Monank Patel stabilized the innings with a 49-run partnership. Monank Patel scored 48, while Rashid Khan's explosive 55 helped MI New York reach a respectable total of 164.

**Consequences:** TSK secured their spot in the challenger on July 26, while MI New York's tournament journey came to an end.

The San Francisco Unicorns defeated the Washington Freedom in match 20 of Major League Cricket 2024, winning by 6 wickets. Sanjay Krishnamurthi scored an unbeaten 79 off 42 balls, and Josh Inglis contributed 45 runs off 17 balls. Despite a strong start by the Washington Freedom, led by Steve Smith and Travis Head, the Unicorns secured the win, reaching a DLS-adjusted target of 177 runs in 14 overs. The match concluded the season for both teams, with the Washington Freedom finishing first due to a higher net run rate and the San Francisco Unicorns finishing second, both teams earning 11 points from seven matches.

* There are two Major League Cricket matches scheduled for July 24.
* The first match is an Eliminator, with teams to be announced, starting at 8:30 PM ET on Willow TV, and can be live-streamed on Fubo.
* The second match is between Texas Super Kings and MI New York, starting at 8:30 PM ET on Willow TV, and can also be live-streamed on Fubo.

* The Texas Super Kings (TSK) finished the group stage with a win against the Seattle Orcas and will face the MI New York (MINY) in the eliminator.
* The match will be the first encounter between the two teams this season, as their previous match was cancelled due to rain.
* Both teams have experienced players who have performed in high-pressure situations, including TSK's Faf du Plessis and MINY's Kieron Pollard.
* The article also provides a suggested Dream11 team for the eliminator match, which includes players from both teams.
* The probable playing XIs for the Texas Super Kings are also provided, with Faf du Plessis as captain and Devon Conway as wicketkeeper.

**Match Result:** Texas Super Kings (TSK) defeated MI New York (MINY) by 9 wickets in the eliminator match of the 2024 Cognizant Major League Cricket.

**Score:** TSK: 167/1 (18.3 overs), MINY: 163/8 (20 overs)

**Key Performances:**

* Faf du Plessis (TSK): 72 off 47 balls, including 6 boundaries and 3 sixes
* Devon Conway (TSK): 50* off 42 balls
* Aaron Hardie (TSK): 34* off 20 balls
* Rashid Khan (MINY): 55 off 30 balls, featuring 4 sixes and 4 boundaries

**Match Summary:** TSK's openers, Faf du Plessis and Devon Conway, laid a solid foundation, putting on a 101-run opening stand. After du Plessis' dismissal, Conway and Aaron Hardie continued the onslaught, ensuring a comfortable 9-wicket victory for TSK. This win secured TSK's place in the challenger on July 26 and ended MI New York's campaign in the tournament.

The Texas Super Kings defeated the Seattle Orcas by 37 runs in their final league match at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas. Calvin Savage's all-round performance led the Super Kings to victory, with Ottneil Bartmann, Noor Ahmad, and Savage himself taking multiple wickets to dismantle the Orcas' batting lineup. The Orcas finished their campaign with one win and six losses, while the Super Kings will play MI New York in the eliminator with three wins and two losses (and two no results). The Super Kings scored 177/8 in their innings, led by Faf Du Plessis' 37 and Calvin Savage's unbeaten 45, while the Orcas were restricted to 140/9 in response, with Quinton de Kock and Keemo Paul scoring 26 and 25 respectively.

**Match Details:**

* The San Francisco Unicorns and Washington Freedom will clash in the Qualifier of Major League Cricket at Grand Prairie Stadium, Grand Prairie, United States on 26th July 2024.

**Team Forms:**

* San Francisco Unicorns: Coming off a win against Washington Freedom, the team is in positive form. They have an explosive opening pair in Finn Allen and Jake Fraser-McGurk, and high expectations rest on Sanjay Krishnamurthi, who played a match-winning knock in the last game.
* Washington Freedom: Despite losing their last match against San Francisco Unicorns, they have been in good form overall. They have a consistent top order with Travis Head and Steven Smith, and a solid middle order with Andries Gous, Rachin Ravindra, and Glenn Maxwell.

**Predicted Lineups:**

* San Francisco Unicorns: Corey Anderson, Finn Allen, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Matthew Short, Josh Inglis, Sanjay Krishnamurthi, Hassan Khan, Brody Couch, Liam Plunkett, Haris Rauf, Tajinder Dhillon
* Washington Freedom: Steven Smith (c), Travis Head, Rachin Ravindra, Andries Gous (wk), Glenn Maxwell, Obus Pienaar, Mukhtar Ahmed, Marco Jansen, Saurabh Netravalkar, Lockie Ferguson, Jasdeep Singh

**Expert Prediction:**

* Washington Freedom are expected to win the match due to their strong top order and balanced bowling attack.

**Match Details:** The article reports on the MLC 2024 Eliminator clash between MI New York and Texas Super Kings at the Grand Prairie Stadium.

**Rashid Khan's Performance:** Afghanistan's star all-rounder Rashid Khan played a crucial role in the match, scoring a scintillating half-century (55 runs off 30 balls) for MI New York. His innings included 4 fours and 4 sixes at an impressive strike rate of 183.33. Rashid also introduced a unique shot, hitting a six over wide long-on with a powerful whip of his bat.

**MI New York's Innings:** After a challenging start, losing two wickets early, MI New York recovered thanks to a 39-run partnership between Shayan Jahangir and Monank Patel. Rashid's aggressive batting then helped elevate the score to a competitive 163/8 in 20 overs.

**Result:** Despite Rashid's efforts, the Texas Super Kings chased down the target with ease, winning the Eliminator game by 9 wickets. Faf du Plessis, the leading run-scorer of the tournament, continued his exceptional form, scoring another fifty to guide TSK to victory.

* Gerald Coetzee, a South African fast bowler, sustained a side strain injury during his stint with the Texas Super Kings in Major League Cricket (MLC) 2024.
* This injury has ruled him out of the upcoming two-Test series against the West Indies.

The article highlights the Major League Cricket (MLC) tournament, a premier T20 competition in the USA, and its significance in providing a platform for players from diverse countries and backgrounds to showcase their talents. The article focuses on three Indian-born players who are part of the MLC: Milind Kumar, Monank Patel, and Saurabh Netravalkar.

* Milind Kumar, a right-handed batsman, plays for the Texas Super Kings (TSK) and has secured his place in the team, regularly batting at number five.
* Monank Patel, the captain of the USA national team, plays for MI New York and has struggled to replicate his international form in MLC, but has shown potential to shine in critical matches.
* Saurabh Netravalkar, a left-arm spinner, plays for the Washington Freedom and has been the top wicket-taker in the tournament, picking up 12 wickets in five games.

The article concludes by highlighting the opportunities MLC provides for cricketers with diverse backgrounds and journeys, fostering a unique cricketing ecosystem in the USA.

The top batters for the teams are Steve Smith (WAS) with 247 runs, Finn Allen (SF) with 186 runs, and Matthew Short (SF) with 170 runs. The top bowlers are Saurabh Netravalkar (WAS) with 12 wickets, Glenn Maxwell (WAS) with 9 wickets, and Hassan Khan (SF) with 6 wickets. The predicted winner of the match is San Francisco Unicorns, with two possible scenarios: if WAS bats first, SF is expected to win by 7 wickets, and if SF bats first, they are expected to win by 25-45 runs.

The article previews the upcoming Eliminator match in the Major League Cricket tournament, which will be played between TEX (Texas Super Kings) and NY (MI New York). The article promises to provide player records and head-to-head records for the Texas Super Kings and MI New York teams.

* Teams: Texas Super Kings (TEX) vs MI New York (NY)

* Time: 6:00 AM IST
* Venue: Grand Prairie Cricket Stadium, Dallas
* Stage: Eliminator

**Match Result:** MI New York defeated Los Angeles Night Riders by 6 wickets in the 19th match of the MLC 2024 tournament.

**Key Performers:** Rashid Khan, the Afghan star player, was the hero for MI New York, taking 3 crucial wickets for 30 runs and earning the Player of the Match award. Trent Boult and Nastus also contributed to the team's bowling effort, taking 2 wickets each. Nicholas Pooran top-scored for MI New York with 35 runs, while captain Kieron Pollard and Bravo chipped in with 33 and 27 runs respectively.

**Tournament Standing:** Despite a disappointing start to the tournament, MI New York, the defending champions, have made a strong comeback and qualified for the Super 4 stage with a better run rate than Los Angeles Night Riders.

* Saurabh Netravalkar is currently leading the bowling charts in MLC 2024 with 12 wickets from five matches, while Head and Smith are second and third in the overall batters' list.

Overall, the Washington Freedom team is looking to become the first team to enter the final of the MLC 2024 season by winning the Qualifier match against San Francisco Unicorns.

* In a scary moment, San Francisco Unicorns fast-bowler Carmi le Roux was hit on the head by a hard shot from Seattle Orcas batsman Ryan Rickleton, leaving his face bloodied, but he was able to walk off the field on his own.
* Despite le Roux's injury, the San Francisco Unicorns were able to restrict the Seattle Orcas to 142 and win the game, with Liam Plunkett being the top performer with figures of 3/26 in four overs.
* The Seattle Orcas suffered another defeat two days later to the Los Angeles Knight Riders, leaving them at the bottom of the MLC season two table with only one win in five games.
* Defending champions MI New York are also struggling, sitting in fifth place outside the playoff spots.

The eliminator match of the MLC 2024 will be played between Texas Super Kings (TSK) and MI New York (MINY) on July 25, 2024, at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas. The winner of this match will advance to the next round, while the loser will be eliminated from the tournament. Texas Super Kings are considered to have a slight advantage due to their balanced squad featuring explosive batters like Devon Conway, Faf du Plessis, and Marcus Stoinis, as well as a strong bowling attack led by Dwayne Bravo and Noor Ahmad. MI New York will rely on the big-hitting prowess of Nicholas Pooran and Kieron Pollard to propel them to victory. The predicted score if TSK bat first is 174+, and if MINY bat first is 145+. The winning chances are predicted to be 62% for TSK and 38% for MINY, with TSK predicted to win the match.
